item.description:
Hi ladies! I really like bowling (mostly for the social aspect), and the winter season registration just opened for Better Off Bowling. It's a league I've done once before and enjoyed! The cost is about $70 per person but it includes all games and shoe rentals. The season starts January 6th and is on Sunday afternoons. I'd love to put a team together if there is serious interest. Anyone else up for bowling?

Www.betteroffbowling.com
item.name: Better Off Bowling!
